title: The Faces & Places of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

What is the Great Circle? Where will Indy’s latest adventure take you? Who will you meet along the way? Discover it all here.

All over the globe lay ancient sites of power. Connect them all and you’ll have a perfect circle.

The Great Circle.

Step into the shoes of the legendary archaeologist as he dives into his latest globetrotting adventure in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle. When Indy sets out from Marshall College on the trail of a stolen artifact, he never could have predicted that his journey would put him on a dangerous path around the world, following ancient rumors and legends.

As Indy, you’ll race against sinister forces, uncovering the mystery behind the rumored “Great Circle.” But what is the Great Circle? What power has laid hidden for centuries? What’s at the end of the road?

What is the Great Circle?

17 sites around the globe make up the Great Circle, including Gizeh in Africa and Sukhothai in Asia. This mystical alignment of ancient sites has been the source of speculations and conspiracy theories, with some claiming there is a supernatural force connecting the sites.

At a recent dig at the “Mountain of the Dead” in Siwa – located on the Great Circle – Indy discovered a beautifully preserved, but seemingly historically unimportant cat mummy. The cat mummy was brought back to Marshall College, where it became the subject of a midnight heist in the college museum. A heist that would start Indy on the path to uncovering the mystery of the Great Circle.

A Globetrotting Adventure

You’ll travel the world in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, from the revered corridors of the Vatican and the icy summits of the Himalayas to Great Circle sites like the verdant, submerged temples of Sukhothai and the scorching sands of Gizeh.

Marshall College

Connecticut, USA

An esteemed university where Professor Indiana Jones lectures America’s youth on history and its forgotten artifacts. The peace of academia is shattered when the college museum is ransacked and one of Indy’s recent finds is stolen. Together with his friend Marcus Brody, Indy investigates the break-in and discovers a lead that will take him to the ends of the Earth.

The Vatican

The Holy City: home to priceless relics and ancient conspiracies, and now overrun by malevolent invaders. With the help of his inside man Father Antonio, Indy disguises himself as a priest and infiltrates the Vatican to search for his stolen treasure, but stumbles into the nefarious machinations of rival archaeologist Emmerich Voss.

Gizeh

Egypt

Teaming up with the intrepid journalist Gina Lombardi, Indy chases Voss to the pyramids of Egypt. In his reckless pursuit of power, Voss’ men have torn up this noble land in search of an artifact of the Great Circle: an old and powerful alignment of ancient wonders. Gina’s contact, Nawal, helps Indy save the antiquities that Voss and his goons would destroy and see that they go to Cairo Museum, where they belong.

Sukhothai

Siam

There are many stories of what lies hidden in the jungles of Siam, and some of them are true. Indy and Gina join with a local band of rebels to locate a dangerous relic before it falls under enemy control. Indy must choose who to trust as he dives below the surface to find the truth beneath the myths.

Himalayas

Nepal

Indy and Gina scale the heights of the Himalayas to beat Voss to an enigmatic distress signal and discover a dangerous mistake that their enemies would prefer to keep hidden. It does not take long for Voss’s men to catch up to them, leading to a death-defying confrontation at the top of the world.

And Beyond…

Indy’s journey will take him around the globe in search of answers, racing against Voss to stop him and his forces from getting their hands on a mysterious, ancient power. Power that could bring the whole world to heel under their rule.
